Reference

Main functions

The higher-level functions to manipulate XML files

get_param_names_xml()

Getting parameters names from xml files

get_param_xml()

Getting parameter values from xml files

set_param_xml()

Setting parameter values into xml files

gen_obs()

Write STICS obs data from data.frame

XML files generation

Generate XML files from a template

gen_ini_xml()

Generate from a template or an input file a Stics ini xml file

gen_obs()

Write STICS obs data from data.frame

gen_paramsti()

Generating a param.sti type file

gen_sols_xml()

Generate from a template a Stics sols xml file

gen_sta_xml()

Generate from a template or an input file a Stics sta xml file

gen_tec_xml()

Generate Stics tec xml file(s) from a template or an input file

gen_usms_obs()

Generating observation data files from a data.frame

gen_usms_xml()

Generate from a template a Stics usms xml file

gen_usms_xml2txt()

Generating one or several usms directories from a javastics workspace content

gen_varmod()

Generating a var.mod type file

Get info XML

Getting information from XML files

get_param_xml()

Getting parameter values from xml files

get_formalisms_xml()

Get the formalism(s) parameters from a file or a list of

find_param_formalisms()

Finding parameters names using partial search words

get_param_names_xml()

Getting parameters names from xml files

find_param_names()

Finding parameters names using partial search words

get_plants_nb()

Getting plants number per usm, all or selected from a given list

get_usms_files()

Getting existing xml files path list per usm from an usms.xml file

get_usms_list()

Getting usms names list for an usms.xml file

get_param_bounds_xml()

Getting parameters bounds from xml files

get_params_dict()

Getting an intern dictionnary or merging it with a given dictionnary given as argument

Set values XML

Setting new values in an XML files

set_param_xml()

Setting parameter values into xml files

set_codeoptim()

Set codoptim

Get values text

Getting values from the STICS input text files

get_param_txt() get_ini_txt() get_general_txt() get_tmp_txt() get_plant_txt() get_tec_txt() get_soil_txt() get_station_txt() get_usm_txt() get_out_var_txt()

Read STICS input parameters

find_out_var()

Find output variable names for STICS

Set values text

Setting new values in the STICS input text files

set_param_txt() set_usm_txt() set_station_txt() set_ini_txt() set_general_txt() set_tmp_txt() set_plant_txt() set_tec_txt() set_soil_txt() set_out_var_txt()

Set (replace) STICS input file parameters

Climate and observations

Read climate data and observations

get_climate_txt()

Read STICS input meteo file

get_obs()

Read STICS observation files *.obs and store data into a list

STICS outputs

Get STICS daily outputs

get_daily_results()

Loading Stics daily output file(s)

XML to text conversion

Build STICS input text files from XML files

convert_xml2txt()

Transforming a Stics xml file into a text file

Download example data

For complex examples

download_data()

Download example USMs

Mailing

All functions related to mailing (automatic generation of XML from a table)

copy_mailing_example()

Copying an example of an Excel parameters file into a directory (from package data)

copy_mailing_script_example()

Get script(s) example(s) for generating xml Stics files from tables (data.frame, tibble)

Misc

Miscellaneous helper functions

get_stics_versions_compat()

Get all stics XML versions
